title: Isaac Button: country potter
creator_credit: Robert Fournier, John Anderson, Films for Potters and J M Anderson Films
brief_description: The film records the skill of the last potter working at Soil Hill Pottery near Halifax. This was one of the few potteries making thrown vessels to survive into the 1960’s.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Fournier, John Anderson, Films for Potters and J M Anderson Films
description: The film records the skill of the last potter working at Soil Hill Pottery near Halifax. This was one of the few potteries making thrown vessels to survive into the 1960’s.
